1461478417434652682.text:
@HouseDemocrats @RepAdams I am proud to support this groundbreaking legislation and cannot wait to see the lives that will inevitably change in my district, in Illinois, and across the country. 

We made promises. With this bill, we will act on them.

1461477722497159178.text:
@HouseDemocrats @RepAdams Not only does this bill make all these transformative investments, but it does so while not increasing taxes on anyone earning less than $400,000 per year. 

We'll raise trillions just by making the wealthiest Americans and largest corporations pay their fair share in taxes.

1461476850450976770.text: @HouseDemocrats @RepAdams The Build Back Better Act will also provide an additional $2.5 billion for the Department of Justice to support evidence-informed intervention strategies to reduce community violence through training, technical assistance, research, evaluation, and data collection.

1461476613762293762.text:
@HouseDemocrats @RepAdams I know rising crime rates have made many communities feel unsafe, and the first step to fixing this problem is dedicating funding to crime prevention.

HHS will receive $2.5 billion to support public health approaches to reducing community violence and trauma.

1461476400783843328.text:
@HouseDemocrats @RepAdams Another effort to address our housing crisis comes in the form of $450 million for the Section 202 Supportive Housing for the Elderly program. 

We can all agree that providing stable housing for seniors is one of our most fundamental obligations.

1461476312787337217.text: @jonfavs A 🧵 on a few more of the life-saving provisions in the bill: https://t.co/lOamBoAhE4

1461476134852378627.text: @HouseDemocrats @RepAdams Stable housing improves physical and mental health as well as educational outcomes. Through a $65 billion investment, we will nearly eliminate the existing capital needs backlog for public housing, changing the lives of millions of Americans.

1461475830794752008.text: @HouseDemocrats @RepAdams Seniors will also have their out-of-pocket pharmacy costs capped at $2,000 per year thanks to Medicare's new ability to negotiate drug prices and penalize manufacturers who raise prices faster than inflation.

1461475464602656769.text: @HouseDemocrats @RepAdams For far too long, Medicare coverage failed to include hearing care and hearing aids. This legislation changes that. Now no senior will have to go without hearing benefits.

1461475150658949122.text:
@HouseDemocrats @RepAdams For some seniors, nursing homes aren’t the right option for them. 

New investments in home-based care will allow seniors and people with disabilities on Medicaid the choice to stay in their homes and communities if they choose.

1461474857716232196.text: @HouseDemocrats @RepAdams We will also invest over $1.6 billion in health care workers who serve seniors and people with disabilities in nursing homes, intermediate care facilities, and more, ensuring everyone receives quality care.

1461474452840058882.text:
@HouseDemocrats @RepAdams Our country is in the midst of a health care provider shortage exasperated by the COVID-19 pandemic. 

The #BuildBackBetterAct provides $2 billion for the National Health Service Corps and $500 million for the Nurse Corps, to educate new health professionals.

1461474082428538880.text:
@HouseDemocrats @RepAdams Veterans put their lives on the line for our country. We owe them 21st-century care when they come home.

A $2.3 billion investment in the VA’s brick-and-mortar infrastructure will allow them to make improvements to aging facilities and help fulfill our promise to servicemembers.

1461473757730639877.text:
@HouseDemocrats @RepAdams We must end the stigma around HIV/AIDS and support people living with the virus.

The Build Back Better Act will deliver $75 million to support the Ryan White program to provide quality care to people living with HIV/AIDS.

1461473395867103238.text: @HouseDemocrats My friend @RepAdams just reminded me that #BuildBackBetter also makes over $1 billion in historic investments in the health and care of moms! Together, we can save moms' lives and end racial and ethnic maternal health disparities.

1461473145005748225.text: @HouseDemocrats We have learned over the past two years how important it is to be prepared for pandemics. Our public health infrastructure will be significantly enhanced by a $1.3 billion investment in vaccine production capacity.

1461472795825741828.text:
@HouseDemocrats Many people in need of affordable, quality health care live in states that did not expand Medicaid. 

This bill will finally close that gap and empower them to access low-to-no-cost, high-quality health plans.

1461472420091543554.text: @HouseDemocrats The Build Back Better Act will build on the success of the American Rescue Plan to make sure that health care is affordable and accessible for ALL families.

1461472095267868675.text: @HouseDemocrats Lead in drinking water can be disastrous for children’s health and development, impacting intelligence and children’s capacity to learn. That’s why we’re investing $10 billion for lead water line replacements.

1461471841537736712.text:
@HouseDemocrats Methane is one of the most potent greenhouse gases, orders of magnitude more effective than CO2 at trapping heat in the atmosphere.

A new Methane Emissions Reductions Program will drive down methane emissions and establish a new charge for methane waste.

1461471586226167812.text: @HouseDemocrats Back in 2017, the Trump Tax cuts opened the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge to fossil fuel development—this legislation would protect this incredible, unique, and fragile landscape from fossil fuel excavation.

1461471336686137351.text:
@HouseDemocrats In the 20th century, planners purposefully routed some highways directly through communities of color, cutting them off from schools, churches & more.

With a $2.3 billion investment, we will reconnect these areas, so communities of color have equal access to opportunities.

1461471055315451914.text: @HouseDemocrats We're replacing more than just USPS vehicles. Heavy-duty vehicles like trash trucks and school buses contribute to climate change AND release hazardous pollutants into communities. We're going to replace them with zero-emission alternatives so the air we breathe stays cleaner.

1461470793091661828.text:
@HouseDemocrats The federal government must lead the way in the transition to electric cars. 

$5.9 billion will go toward electrifying the Postal Service vehicle fleet. That's enough to replace 70% of USPS trucks with climate-friendly electric vehicles.

1461470565831790595.text:
@HouseDemocrats The transportation sector is the largest source of greenhouse gas emissions in the U.S.

To address this, we're dedicating $4 billion to lowering roadway emissions, including $950 million in grants for states that make progress towards reducing greenhouse gas emissions.

1461470228043509760.text:
@HouseDemocrats But we don't stop there.

Good public transit makes cities more accessible, livable, and cleaner. We're including $10 billion for Transit Oriented Development, to make sure that transit is actually serving our communities and getting people to and from where they need to go.

1461469959259836422.text: @HouseDemocrats The Build Back Better Act dedicates $200 million to improve climate and weather forecasting, $100 million to air quality research, and $365 million to climate-related Research and Development at NASA.

1461469731991560197.text:
@HouseDemocrats Extreme weather events have brought the climate crisis front and center.

To tackle the most important issue of our lifetimes, we are passing the largest and most consequential climate change bill ever passed in the United States.

1461469452655026178.text:
@HouseDemocrats Build Back Better provides $10B for child nutrition programs, meaning an additional 325,000 children in Illinois will be eligible to receive free school meals.

It also extends the Summer EBT program to ensure that no child goes hungry just because school is out of session.

1461469222043856912.text: @HouseDemocrats For school districts like Chicago, where it’s become difficult to retain teachers, $112 million in grants to recruit and train teachers from within our own community will mean more educators bringing their unique understanding of our city into our classrooms.

1461468953193103366.text: @HouseDemocrats Too often formerly incarcerated people are left unprepared to reintegrate into the workforce. We can ensure that they have the entrepreneurial skills they need to succeed with a $105 million investment in training and counseling incarcerated and formerly incarcerated individuals.

1461468664335642624.text:
@HouseDemocrats While higher education may not be for everyone, everyone deserves the opportunity to have a good-paying job. 

We're providing $20 billion in workforce development funding for apprenticeship programs as well as career and technical training.

1461468406490800129.text:
@HouseDemocrats That's not the only education expansion @HouseDemocrats will pass. This bill will increase the max Pell Grant by $550 and make federal student aid available to Dreamers for the first time. 

We will change the lives of 162,000 students in Illinois alone who rely on Pell Grants.

1461467988389941248.text:
@HouseDemocrats From the earliest age, children should have access to tools that put them on the path to success.

Build Back Better will make universal pre-k a reality for 3 and 4 year-olds across the country. In Illinois, that's over 250k children gaining access to high-quality preschool.

1461467747200778247.text: @HouseDemocrats First, let’s start with our nation’s first federal paid leave policy. Families will finally be empowered to care for their new child or a sick parent thanks to a federal program providing four weeks of paid family and medical leave.

1461467485052575750.text: @HouseDemocrats To better understand just how important this legislation will be, let’s break down some of what’s in the bill and what it will do for communities in Chicago and across the country.

1461467088338436096.text: While cable news likes to talk about everything that's NOT in the Build Back Better Act, the reality is @HouseDemocrats are going to pass the most significant legislation since Roosevelt's New Deal. 1417507373510443012.text: Last, but far from least, one of the approved projects would fund the creation of a grade separation of the West Grand Avenue Highway and the Metra rail tracks, making the area safer and decreasing the environmental impacts of the intersection.

1417503122843385857.text: The @lincolnparkzoo would be able to upgrade its infrastructure to enhance visitor safety, lessen the zoo’s environmental impact, and improve the security and well-being of animals and staff.

1417502569736376321.text: Funding for @ChiPubSchools would go straight to the schools that need it most so they can make repairs and improvements. With stronger physical structures around them, students can focus better on their academic work.

I call on all of us to do better by the animals we share this planet with.

1395452031951900673.text: But this is about each one of us understanding and acting as though every living thing deserves respect and nothing, no matter what species, deserves to suffer the way far too many animals in the United States are suffering right now.

1395452030601342981.text: I'm the author of the #BigCatPublicSafetyAct and the Federal #BirdSafeBuildings Act. I'm a member of the Congressional Animal Protection Caucus and I'll do my part to make sure that our government is looking out for those who can't look out for themselves.

1395452029376544772.text: ...rather than being shipped overseas to an uncertain fate. That story had a happy ending but I was still struck by the callousness and cruelty that lead to the situation in the first place.

1395452027740868612.text: It's not just big cats. In August, twenty French bulldog puppies were abandoned in a warehouse at O'Hare airport and left in cages for days before being discovered by a policeman and rescued. One died. I was glad to help navigate the bureaucracy to ensure those dogs could stay...

1395452026511839233.text: As a pet owner, an animal lover, and a human being, I am disgusted by the thought of any animal being subjected to torture, abuse, and utter indifference from the day of its birth. We must be better than this.

1395452025253634057.text: Between today’s news about 68 mistreated big cats finally being confiscated from a known abuser (I'm sure we all remember #TigerKing), last week’s news about a loose tiger in Houston, and too many other horrible stories in recent months- enough is enough!

1387593196407083009.text:
Tonight, President Biden laid out an ambitious plan to not just put our nation on the path back toward normalcy but to ensure that we never leave anyone behind again.

I look forward to working with @POTUS and @HouseDemocrats to make that vision a reality. #JointAddress

1387589992223023107.text: Our democracy has endured for over a century and it will continue to endure. An insurrection may have tried to bring us down, but we are stronger together. #JointAddress

1387589073859133444.text: Let's pass the Dream Act NOW. #HomeIsHere #JointAddress

1387588819046780930.text: Gun owners themselves support reform. That says it all. Responsible gun owners know their right to bear arms isn't being taken away. They know the only thing that will change is lives will be saved. #JointAddress

1387588699190403078.text: The reason we have failed to make changes to gun legislation is simple. Republicans are more committed to the NRA than they are to saving lives. It's unacceptable. Republicans must act. #JointAddress

1387588476187578368.text: I'm proud that @POTUS has taken action on gun violence. But now it's time for the Senate to step up, stand up for what is right, and pass the common sense gun legislation the House has put forward. #JointAddress

1387588089263140864.text: Gun violence doesn't have to be the norm in America. Closing background check loopholes and banning assault weapons are common-sense policies with bipartisan support. It's time to make them the law. #JointAddress

1387587661309878272.text:
President Biden to trans Americans: "Your President has your back."

We stand with you. 🏳️‍🌈 #JointAddress

1387587258920968198.text: I echo President Biden's words tonight. Many of our law enforcement officers are good people, risking their lives everyday. We must support them while also working to combat systemic racism so no person loses their life to preventable police violence. #JointAddress

1387586994197471232.text: No one should ever have to fear for their life during a police interaction—but that's the reality for far too many Brown and Black communities in Chicago and across the country. I applaud @POTUS's efforts to end police violence and put our nation on a path toward racial justice.

1387586776936632321.text:
President Biden is right- we have an opportunity to make America more equal for everyone.

We must continue the fight for justice if we want to create a future where NO ONE loses their lives to preventable police violence. #JusticeInPolicing #JointAddress

1387586606790553601.text: As @VP Harris has said, "A measure of justice isn’t the same as equal justice." The verdict against Derek Chauvin was an important step, but there is so much work left to be done. We must pass the George Floyd #JusticeinPolicingAct. #JointSession

1387586526872326144.text: The Trump administration pressured and ignored our intelligence experts. President Biden will listen to the experts and keep our nation safe. #JointAddress

1387586148214743050.text: Our last president cozied up to Putin. Tonight, President Biden made it clear once again that he will put America and its allies' interests first. #JointAddress

1387585985022763010.text:
"American leadership means ending the forever war in Afghanistan." -@POTUS 

It's time to bring our servicemembers home. #JointAddress

1387584629146796034.text: America is known for stepping up when help is needed. It should be no different when it comes to vaccines. @POTUS's pledge to send vaccines abroad is the right move because this is a global virus, and the only chance we have at beating it is by working together. #JointAddress

1387584552034578435.text: When the mega rich only get richer during a global pandemic, it's clear: our systems must change so that they work for everyone, not only those at the top. #JointSession

1387584131819786247.text: .@POTUS's plan means we can begin to narrow the gap between what the US is owed and what it collects. It also means holding the 1% accountable for their fair share. As chair of FSGG, I look forward to working with @POTUS on this effort. #JointAddress

1387583660849762312.text: If the IRS is going to crack down on tax evasion by corporations and the wealthiest Americans, we must ensure they have the means to do so. I'll be working with @AppropsDems and @POTUS to make sure the IRS has what they need to work efficiently and successfully. #JointAddress

1387583412089892865.text: Let's make something clear, there will be no tax increase on any person making less than $400,000. It's that simple. #JointAddress

1387583293567246336.text: According to the IRS, there’s over a trillion dollars in uncollected tax- dollars that could be used to pay for childcare, college, climate action, and more. As chair of the committee that funds the IRS, I’ll work with @POTUS to ensure everyone is paying their fair share.

1387583157617274882.text:
Improving IRS enforcement will have two benefits:

1: The wealthiest Americans will finally have to pay their fair share
2: We can spend our tax dollars on the things we care about most, like taking care of our children and helping hard-working Americans succeed
#JointAddress

1387582991338287108.text: No person should choose between putting food on the table, or paying for life saving medication. #JointAddress

1387582136853598215.text:
The #AmericanRescuePlan will lift more than five million children out of poverty this year alone, cutting child poverty by more than half.

@POTUS and @HouseDemocrats aren't done yet. No child should go hungry OR live in poverty. #AmericanFamiliesPlan #JointAddress

1387582075952324608.text: Too many families struggle to balance child care with other financial responsibilities, keeping millions from reaching the middle class. President Biden’s #AmericanFamiliesPlan will make child care more affordable for millions of parents. #BuildBackBetter #JointAddress

1387581884893433860.text: For years, the US has been behind the curve on paid leave, keeping millions of women out of the workforce. And the pandemic made that trend even worse. @POTUS's family and medical leave plan will help women keep working and - most importantly - keep children safe and healthy.

1387581708954918913.text: Teachers have been at the forefront of the pandemic from day one. They’ve faced enormous obstacles and worked tirelessly to continue doing their job. The #AmericanFamiliesPlan works to improve teacher training, while also making sure they know we have their backs. #JointAddress

1387581377135185921.text: An education shouldn’t be a privilege for the few, it should be a right for all. I support @POTUS's plan to give all Americans access to 2 years of free community college. Education can be a first step to success and financial security, let’s make it easier to get there.

1387581245597667328.text: Studies have shown that the earliest years of a child's education are the most pivotal. That's why there should be universal, quality preschool for all three- and four- year-olds. Luckily, the American Families Plan will make that a reality. #JointAddress

1387579736768057346.text: A country without equal pay is a country living in the past. The Paycheck Fairness Act fixes that. Let's send it to @POTUS's desk. #JointAddress

1387579282591997957.text: The American Jobs Plan will put people to work, while putting America on the path to going green. Saving our planet from the impacts of climate change is will not only pay for itself, it'll save us money in the long run. #JointAddress

1387578579047915529.text: "When I think climate change, I think jobs." -@POTUS #AmericanJobsPlan #JointAddress

1387577717692973057.text: President Biden’s American Jobs Plan will create millions of good paying jobs, rebuild our country’s physical infrastructure and workforce, and spark innovation and manufacturing right here at home. #BuildBackBetter #JointAddress

1387577623828705283.text: Under @POTUS we saw more jobs created in the first 100 days than any other president before. If that isn't a sign of American moving forward, and moving fast, I don't know what is. #JointAddress

1387577358144659461.text: If we want to ensure America can out-compete any other country in the world, the first step is fixing our infrastructure. By passing the #AmericanJobsPlan, we can create millions of jobs and plant the seed to spawn broad economic growth for decades to come. #JointAddress

1387577280608837633.text: "We have to do more than just build back. We have to build back better." -@POTUS #JointAddress

1387576271064993793.text: Since Congress and President Biden kept our campaign pledge to provide Americans with direct payments, millions of American families have received checks, helping our communities through this difficult time. #AmericanRescuePlan #JointAddress

1387576200978128903.text: “A dose of hope” are just the right words. The more people who are vaccinated, the closer we get to putting COVID behind us, and moving forward to better days. #JointAddress

1304456858044960769.text: Another species being impacted by climate change are Shenandoah’s salamanders. As the climate warms, it gets dryer on mountain tops and that’s bad for the Park’s salamanders. Clouds like we’re experiencing today also become less and less common. https://t.co/6Evh9nsb4j

1304454339122008064.text: High elevation Greenstone outcrop communities are only found in @ShenandoahNPS and there are only about 30 acres left. https://t.co/Tr4r8clWKn

1243534198901743633.text:
I’m on my way back to Washington to cast my vote for relief for millions of Americans who’s lives and livelihoods have been affected by this pandemic. This is a bipartisan package that has overwhelming support from both sides of the aisle. 

No one should be stopping this vote.

1243326329447211010.text: Speaker Pelosi and Leader Schumer worked long and hard to come to a bipartisan compromise with the White House and together, we made sure that the American workers are put first. Congress should be embracing these accomplishments, not inflaming partisan tensions.

1243326328763494400.text: One of my longest standing priorities has been protecting our elections. Since primaries and elections have been pushed back across the country, we worked to include $400 billion in election assistance so we can be sure that the voices of Americans are heard in November.

1243326328000196611.text: We stripped out a $30 billion bailout for the oil industry and instead made sure that we included $30 billion for schools to continue serving their students. #FamiliesFirst

1243326327236833283.text: In continuing to uphold our values and putting #FamiliesFirst, @HouseDemocrats fought for and won an expansion of fast relief for small businesses and made rent, mortgage, and utility costs eligible for SBA loan forgiveness.

1243326326507024386.text: Democrats made sure that no one in this administration or in the Trump family can benefit from this crisis by including strict oversight and preventing any secret bailouts. And for good measure, no Members of Congress can benefit either. #FamiliesFirst

1243326325663956993.text: We fought for unemployment insurance that goes well beyond what Republicans proposed. Now all workers, including gig workers, are protected, we expanded eligibility from 3 to 4 months and ensured this would be paycheck replacement PLUS an additional $600 per week. #FamiliesFirst

1243326324174925824.text: Let's do some fact checking. In reality, @HouseDemocrats fought to make sure workers would come first this package, instead of corporations. Here are just a few of the initiatives we championed: https://t.co/D1ZMfxIZJ0
